author: Gerry Plasky
comment: Throw in an option for a date and a white background.

reply.author: Ethan Peacock
reply.content:
Hey thanks for the support.  I am currently working on implementing this, but I wanted to say I apprecite the review and the help!

Ethan Peacock

title: Great!

author: Nicholas Carvalho
comment: Love the watch face would like a light background option and ability to change colors of the dial. Keep up the great work 5 stars when that changes

reply.author: Ethan Peacock
reply.content:
Thanks for the feedback!  I already have a light background designed with the silver watches in mind.  I will be including features that let users configure custom colors and possible widths as well.  Besides a lighter background would you be interested in any other colors? 
Ethan Peacock

title: Great looking classic face

author: Steve Meier
comment: Add a Date and I'll give it a 5

reply.author: Ethan Peacock
reply.content:
I appreciate the feedback!  This will be coming with many other updated features and designs soon.  I wanted to say thanks to everyone that has tried out this watch face so far and that I look forward to progressing this watch face.

If you have any ideas you would like to see carried out, please do not hesitate to let me know!

Ethan Peacock

title: Very Nice
